page.title: 17CROSS HILLS CHAPEL
page.content: The Cross Hills Chapel lies between Thornton and Bagworth .It was built in 1885,it will seat 300 people.This year is its centenary.There will be a procession of witness to the chapel,as was done in 1885 at the opening.A man named Sammuel Deacan took services on open ground and then in cottages.In the 1920s,the chapel was so packed people sat on the banks across the road to listen to the service.Today only 12 adults and 10 children attend. The church building is suffering severely today from mining subsidence and is in need of repair.
